title: LF gold+ ranked team :)
body:
I'm looking for a gold+ ranked or duo team to join :)
I play from Melbourne and main Mid/Top with a champion pool that includes: LeBlanc, Talon, Gnar, Wukong and Irelia. But I'm willing to learn new meta champions if I have to (I also play ap ezreal occasionally but he's a rare pick).
I'm a friendly 15 year old who uses skype and can play most days of the week, I am also gold 5.
Semi Competitve would be preferable.

Thanks in advance~
Also, if it matters for some reason, I'm gay, homophobes plz stay away

replies.body: im gold 4 but went silver because provisionals, im 15 and i use skype. ill add you
